cohort: ER+/HER2- MBC, 2L, Medicare, Site C, by Provider (2024–2025)
summary: Dr. Rodriguez has a 12% CDK4/6i utilization rate for Medicare patients, 10% below Site C average. Targeted intervention could yield $38,000/year.

clinical_impact.description: Improving Dr. Rodriguez's Medicare utilization increases survival.

action_steps: Assign financial navigator to Dr. Rodriguez's Medicare patients
suggestions: Share best practices from Dr. Chen with Dr. Rodriguez
